title: StarCraft 2: RELENTLESS Terran Aggression! (Classic vs GuMiho)
excerpt: Awesome match of Terran versus Protoss played at the professional level of StarCraft 2. This is the first game I cast featuring Classic, after he came back to StarCraft 2.
